sentences.en: But by the look of the past few years, that barb may have lost its sting.

sentences.en: Surgeons removed a foot - long barb from his heart.

sentences.en: The Barb is what makes a hook stick in a fishes mouth ( or your finger ).

sentences.en: The barb stung her exactly the way he hoped it would.

words.tran_cn: 有刺的；讽刺的；有倒钩的
讽刺（barb的过去分词）；装倒钩

trans.tran_cn: （箭头、鱼钩等的）倒钩，带刺的话，毕露的锋芒，<植>钩状毛
trans.tran_en: the sharp curved point of a hook,  arrow  etc that prevents it from being easily pulled out
